
## Five Tallest Buildings in Chicago
*As of January 15, 2017*


1. Willis Tower - 1,451 ft, 108 floors
2. Trump International Hotel and Tower - 1,389 ft, 98 floors
3. Aon Center - 1,136 ft, 83 floors
4. John Hancock Center - 1,127 ft, 100 floors
5. Franklin Center - 1,007 ft, 60 floors


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=41.87887, lng=-87.63600,
             popup="Willis Tower") %>%
  addMarkers(lat=41.88888, lng=-87.62645,
             popup="Trump International Hotel and Tower") %>%
  addMarkers(lat=41.88528, lng=-87.62151,
             popup="Aon Center") %>%
  addMarkers(lat=41.89880, lng=-87.62283,
             popup="John Hancock Center") %>%
  addMarkers(lat=41.88029, lng=-87.63474,
             popup="Franklin Center")
my_map
```
